AboutUs.ProductCertification: All four products of the MONT-YAK brand received international organic food certification issued by the Certified Authority of Mongolia.

Ingredients.name: Vitamin C
Ingredients.description: Vitamin C is an essential vitamin used by your gums and natural microbes. It demonstrates a strong defense against bacteria associated with dental decay and gingivitis.

FAQ.question: Do all products contain preservatives?
FAQ.answer: No, all our products are free from artificial preservatives.

FAQ.answer: Our products are available at selected retail stores and online.
